acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleIntegerValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.IntegerValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field 49 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field 391 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 81 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 946 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
